comments.body:
These 5 lines could be reduced to just this:
```python
vss_spec.bridge = vim.host.VirtualSwitch.BondBridge(nicDevice=self.nic_name)
```
Because it should already be a list.
You renamed this to `nics` but not sure this is adapted everywhere ?
